data.name: Cat Warfare
data.detailed_description:
About Cat Warfare

Cat Warfare is an old-school shooter with fast action and the classic multi weapon arsenal.


  • Classic Deathmatch
  • Team Deathmatch
  • Capture The Flag [WIP]

Pick your poison!
From a Nailgun to a Tesla Gun!
You chose the firepower to finish the fight.

Fight in a city, space or even a factory.
Take the fight anywhere, anytime.



*Host Deathmatch games only.

Please Report any bugs to the discussions form.
Not-So Classic Games does not condone the act of hurting cats.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Cat Warfare is a multiplayer first person shooter that lets you take the place of a cat out for revenge, blood and glory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520 / Nvidia GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 630 / Nvidia GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS X 10.11 (El Capitan) or later
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520 / Nvidia GTS 450
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Cats with guns. Gore can be seen when active in the settings.
